message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product though, and I'd be willing to pay $85. What do you think?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $110. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $95.  If we can agree on that, we'll have a deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $95, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further, so I'm counteroffering at $105. This is my final offer, so if you're not comfortable with it, I'll have to consider other options.
